communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All texts and emails sent or received by Superintendent of Police Larry Snelling from December 1, 2023 to September 1, 2024 that contain any of the following keywords or phrases: Gaza, Palestine, Israel, March on the DNC, March on the DNC 2024, U.S. Palestinian Community Network, USPCN, Bodies Outside of Unjust Laws, Coalition to March, Chicago Alliance Against Racist and Political Repression, CAARPR, sight and sound, sight & sound, genocide, protest. 

For any potentially responsive documents, please send full the conversation history and any attachments.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. I am a freelance reporter for Medill News, and I am requesting this information in that editorial capacity.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Maggie Dougherty

title: March on the DNC 2024 Communications (Mayor's Office)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All texts and emails sent or received by City of Chicago Chief Operating Officer John Roberson, Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson, City of Chicago Chief Financial Officer Jill Jaworski, and former Mayoral Communications Director Ronnie Reese from December 1, 2023 to September 1, 2024 that contain any of the following keywords or phrases: Gaza, Palestine, Israel, March on the DNC, March on the DNC 2024, U.S. Palestinian Community Network, USPCN, Bodies Outside of Unjust Laws, Coalition to March, Chicago Alliance Against Racist and Political Repression, CAARPR, sight and sound, sight & sound, genocide, protest. 

For any potentially responsive documents, please send full the conversation history and any attachments.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. I am a freelance reporter for Medill News, and I am requesting this information in that editorial capacity.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Maggie Dougherty

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All texts and emails sent or received by current Commissioner of the Chicago Department of Transportation (CDOT) Thomas (Tom) Carney from December 1, 2023 to September 1, 2024 that contain any of the following keywords or phrases: Gaza, Palestine, Israel, March on the DNC, March on the DNC 2024, U.S. Palestinian Community Network, USPCN, Bodies Outside of Unjust Laws, Coalition to March, Chicago Alliance Against Racist and Political Repression, CAARPR, sight and sound, sight & sound, genocide, protest. 

For any potentially responsive documents, please send full the conversation history and any attachments.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. I am a freelance reporter for Medill News, and I am requesting this information in that editorial capacity.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Maggie Dougherty

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Hello, 

I request records of the lost and stolen firearms reported to the ATF from FFTL holders as required by 27 CFR § 478.39a 

The records I request are: 
emails to stolenfirearms@atf.gov
ATF Form 3310.11

Databases or other recording records of the number of stolen/lost firearms and found firearms, including where they were found and whether the guns were used in a crime or attempted to be sold. 

Please limit the search to California
Please limit the search to 2018 to YTD 2024

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joey Scott

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Citations/arrests LAPD
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Hello, 

I am requesting records related to the arrests and citations using 41.18 

Please provide me with dates, locations, ages, and other collected demographics of those ticketed/arrested 

Officer deployment records for officers engaged in LASAN CARE+ and RESET operations. The records should include names, hourly costs, and the number of officers involved. 

Please search January 6, 2024 to January 16, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joey Scott

title: Flock Installs (Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Hello, 

I am requesting records related to the installation, approval, and locations of automatic license plate readers from Motorola and Flock Safety

Emails from: 
Akeia Dixon - installs@flocksafety.com
Dave@flocksafety.com
garrett@flocksafety.com
Motorola email domain names

Do not include promo emails or emails from hello@flocksafety.com

Communications related to installations. 
Keyword search: 
"installations"
"install" 
"technicians"
"public works"
"rebates"

Copies of attachments. 
Copies of documentation of installations that include their locations, approvals by the city for installations, and contracts related to the installations 

Limit search to: 2018 - 2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joey Scott
